# unavailabilityReason

**Instance Property**

An error that describes the reason the photo library isn’t available.

## Declaration

```swift
var unavailabilityReason: (any Error)? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains a valid error only when the library is unavailable.

## Observing Library Availability

- **register(_:)**: Registers an object to observe changes to the photo library’s availability.
- **unregisterAvailabilityObserver(_:)**: Unregisters an object from observing changes to the photo library’s availability.
- **PHPhotoLibraryAvailabilityObserver**: A protocol to adopt to have the system notify your app when the availability of a photo library changes.
